messages.subject: [AlwaysLearning] PB Quote
messages.msgSnippet: OK, people, we re all wrong. I knew it had to be out there somewhere:
messages.messageBody:
OK, people, we're all wrong. I knew it had to be out
there somewhere:

<<Buttercup: You mock my pain!

>Dread Pirate Roberts: Life is pain, Highness. Anyone
>who says differently is selling something.>>


DOH! I knew that! I didn't trust my own memory
because the "Life is Pain" line is repeatedly used in
another flick I like "Long Kiss Goodnight" and I
assumed that I was remembering wrong for Princess
Bride, so I followed the line that had already been
suggested. Then of course, just to further confuse
things, there is the "Life's not fair..." speech that
Scar gives to the mouse in "The Lion King." Whenever
I don't listen to my intuition I am always sorry...

Nanci K.
